source_name: Traditional Irish Blessing (adapted from various sources, including the PDF)
author: Unknown
content_detailed:
- blessing: May the road rise to meet you,
- blessing: May the wind be always at your back.
- blessing: May the sun shine warm upon your home,
- blessing: The rains fall soft upon your fields.
- blessing: And the light of friendship guide your paths together,
- blessing: And until we meet again,
- blessing: May you see your children’s children.
- blessing: May you be poor in misfortune, Rich in blessings.
- blessing: May you know nothing but happiness from this day forward.
- blessing: May green be the grass you walk on,
- blessing: May blue be the skies above you,
- blessing: May pure be the joys that surround you,
- blessing: May true be the hearts that love you.
- blessing: And when eternity (can use God here) beckons, at the end of a life heaped high with love,
- blessing: May you know the hand of a friend was always near.
- blessing: And, today, may the Spirit of Love find a dwelling place in your hearts.
